item.title: Trump Should Talk To Angel Parents Before He Takes ICE Out Of Minneapolis
item.description: The father of a woman killed by a drunk illegal alien says appeasing sanctuary mayors and violent radicals will make more victims.

item.title: The Fraud Scandal Is A Bigger Problem Than Cops Can Fix

item.title: Tim Walz Cannot Be Trusted To ‘Cooperate’ On Immigration Enforcement

item.title: Trump’s FCC Is Right To Make Late-Night TV Follow ‘Equal Airtime’ Rules
item.description: When it gave them an excuse to grouse about a Republican on late-night, Democrats were all for the equal-time rule.
